story.title: Our Story
story.description: Founded with a passion for creating exceptional digital experiences, EH Services has grown into a trusted web development agency serving businesses across Germany and beyond. We combine technical expertise with creative vision to deliver websites that not only look stunning but drive real business results.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower businesses with innovative web solutions that enhance their digital presence and drive sustainable growth.

quality.title: Quality First
quality.description: We never compromise on quality. Every project receives our full attention and expertise.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We stay at the forefront of web technologies to deliver cutting-edge solutions.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Clear communication and honest pricing are the foundation of our client relationships.

results.title: Results Driven
results.description: Our success is measured by the success of our clients' digital presence.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.description: A dedicated team of designers, developers, and strategists committed to your success.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services

q1.question: How long does it take to build a website?
q1.answer: Project timelines vary based on complexity. A basic website typically takes 2-4 weeks, while complex custom applications may take 2-3 months. We'll provide a detailed timeline during our initial consultation.

q2.question: What is included in your pricing?
q2.answer: Our pricing includes design, development, testing, and deployment. It also covers basic SEO setup, responsive design, and the agreed-upon support period. Hosting and domain costs are separate unless otherwise specified.

q3.question: Do you offer ongoing maintenance?
q3.answer: Yes! We offer various maintenance packages to keep your website secure, updated, and performing optimally. This includes regular backups, security updates, and content updates.

q4.question: Can you redesign my existing website?
q4.answer: Absolutely! We specialize in both new builds and redesigns. We'll analyze your current site, preserve what works, and enhance everything else to meet modern standards and your business goals.

q5.question: Do you work with clients outside of Germany?
q5.answer: Yes, we work with clients globally. Our team is fluent in both German and English, and we're experienced in remote collaboration across different time zones.

q6.question: What technologies do you use?
q6.answer: We work with WordPress, React, Next.js, and various other modern technologies. We choose the best tech stack based on your specific project requirements and business goals.

q7.question: How do payments work?
q7.answer: We typically require a 50% deposit to begin work, with the remaining 50% due upon project completion. For larger projects, we can arrange milestone-based payments.

q8.question: Will my website be mobile-friendly?
q8.answer: Absolutely! All our websites are fully responsive and optimized for all devices - smartphones, tablets, and desktops. Mobile-first design is a core part of our development process.
